ComicInfo.Summary:
The Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor is revealed to be just the first offensive in a much grander plan. Cassidy leads the fractured remains of the rebels against their forces, but how can they stand up to a threat that is able to beat time itself?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Billy Tucci & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Pasquale Qualano & Wes Hartman | 2 | C | Cover C | Franchesco! | 3 | RE | Retailer Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Franchesco! | 4 | RE | Megacon Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Nei Ruffino | 5 | RE | Megacon Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Nei Ruffino | 6 | Note: The digital edition (3/26/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 14:47:11. [CVDB449114]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Billy Tucci, Franchesco!, Ivan Nunes, Nei Ruffino, Pasquale Qualano
